name: Chris Christie
summary: Former Governor of New Jersey and 2024 Republican presidential candidate who became one of Trump's most prominent GOP critics, calling him unfit and warning he will 'burn America to the ground.'

keyStatements.quote: He is unfit. And be careful of what you're going to get if you ever give Donald Trump the keys to the White House again, because he will only care about his own conduct and his own benefit. And he will not care about the American people.
He's willing to burn it all down to protect himself. He will burn every institution in this country to the ground if it will help him avoid accountability.
Anyone who's unwilling to say he will not support a convicted felon to be president of the United States is unfit to be president themselves.

timeline.event: Ran for president, later endorsed Trump

credibility.background: Former Governor of New Jersey, U.S. Attorney, 2024 and 2016 Republican presidential candidate
positions: U.S. Attorney for District of New Jersey (2002-2008)
